alert.note: Alert for Collingsworth; Donley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Collingsworth and southeastern Donley Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 630 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southeast of Memphis, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wellington and Dodson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Texas.
